abilities.name: Deadlock
abilities.effect: As long as Dunsparce is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Dunsparce can't attack.

attacks.name: Down Draw
attacks.effect: Draw 2 cards from the bottom of your deck.

attacks.name: Tripping Turn
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused. You may switch Dunsparce with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
